The two recursion operators and generate two alternative second

<math id="S3.Ex7.m3" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}\phantom{-}0&\frac{\textstyle b}{%\textstyle a}\\-\frac{\textstyle b}{\textstyle a}&\frac{\textstyle c}{\textstyle a^{2}}\Bigl{%(}bD_{y}-aD_{x}\Bigr{)}+\Bigl{(}D_{y}b-D_{x}a\Bigr{)}\frac{\textstyle c}{%\textstyle a^{2}}+\frac{\textstyle Q_{-}}{\textstyle 2a}D_{z}+D_{z}\frac{%\textstyle Q_{-}}{\textstyle 2a}\end{array}\right)" display="inline"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable columnspacing="5pt" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="center"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>b</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>b</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac></mstyle></mrow></mtd><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>c</mi><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo maxsize="160%" minsize="160%">(</mo><mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>y</mi></msub></mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>x</mi></msub></mrow></mrow><mo maxsize="160%" minsize="160%">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mrow><mo maxsize="160%" minsize="160%">(</mo><mrow><mrow><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>y</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>x</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mrow><mo maxsize="160%" minsize="160%">)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>c</mi><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msub><mi>Q</mi><mo>-</mo></msub><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>z</mi></msub></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>z</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msub><mi>Q</mi><mo>-</mo></msub><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math id="S3.Ex8.m3" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}\phantom{-}0&-\frac{\textstyle c}{%\textstyle a}\\\frac{\textstyle c}{\textstyle a}&\frac{\textstyle b}{\textstyle a^{2}}\Bigl{(%}cD_{z}-aD_{x}\Bigr{)}+\Bigl{(}D_{z}c-D_{x}a\Bigr{)}\frac{\textstyle b}{%\textstyle a^{2}}+\frac{\textstyle Q^{-}}{\textstyle 2a}D_{y}+D_{y}\frac{%\textstyle Q^{-}}{\textstyle 2a}\end{array}\right)" display="inline"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable columnspacing="5pt" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac></mstyle></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac></mstyle></mtd><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo maxsize="160%" minsize="160%">(</mo><mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>z</mi></msub></mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>x</mi></msub></mrow></mrow><mo maxsize="160%" minsize="160%">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mrow><mo maxsize="160%" minsize="160%">(</mo><mrow><mrow><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>z</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>x</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mrow><mo maxsize="160%" minsize="160%">)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msup><mi>Q</mi><mo>-</mo></msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>y</mi></msub></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>y</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msup><mi>Q</mi><mo>-</mo></msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>
The flow (??) can be generated by the Hamiltonian operator from

<math id="S3.E9.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\left(\begin{array}[]{c}u_{t}\\v_{t}\end{array}\right)=J_{0}\left(\begin{array}[]{c}\delta_{u}H_{1}\\\delta_{v}H_{1}\end{array}\right)=J_{1}\left(\begin{array}[]{c}\delta_{u}H_{0}%\\\delta_{v}H_{0}\end{array}\right)." display="block"><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><msub><mi>u</mi><mi>t</mi></msub></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>t</mi></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><msub><mi>J</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><msub><mi>δ</mi><mi>u</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><msub><mi>δ</mi><mi>v</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><msub><mi>J</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><msub><mi>δ</mi><mi>u</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><msub><mi>δ</mi><mi>v</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>.</mo></mrow></math>
which yields another bi-Hamiltonian representation of the CMA system (??)

<math id="S3.E11.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\left(\begin{array}[]{c}u_{t}\\v_{t}\end{array}\right)=J_{0}\left(\begin{array}[]{c}\delta_{u}H_{1}\\\delta_{v}H_{1}\end{array}\right)=J^{1}\left(\begin{array}[]{c}\delta_{u}H^{0}%\\\delta_{v}H^{0}\end{array}\right)." display="block"><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><msub><mi>u</mi><mi>t</mi></msub></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>t</mi></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><msub><mi>J</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><msub><mi>δ</mi><mi>u</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><msub><mi>δ</mi><mi>v</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><msup><mi>J</mi><mn>1</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><msub><mi>δ</mi><mi>u</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mn>0</mn></msup></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><msub><mi>δ</mi><mi>v</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mn>0</mn></msup></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>.</mo></mrow></math>
